sub_title: Beleidsregisseur Erfgoed, Cultuurhistorie en Monumenten bij Gemeente Westerveld
summary:
Gedreven erfgoedexpert met interesse voor reële duurzaamheids- innovaties.

Specialisms: Heritage, Archaeology, Photography.

projects:
[{'title': 'Secretary for the Consultative (Advisory) Group UNESCO World Heritage Nomination files Benevelence Colonies Westerveld, Weststellingwerf and Steenwijkerland municipalities', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': 'Together with the municipalities of Westellingwerf (Friesland Province) and Steenwijkerland (Overijssel Province) Westerveld has joined forces for the UNESCO World Heritage Nomination files for specifically the free (former Agricultural) Benevolence Colonies in the three provinces corner Drenthe, Overijssel and Friesland. Westerveld facilitates the Consultative Group (Sounding Board) which members are been elected from local civilians and entrepreneurs and interests associations like the Stichting Maatschappij van Weldadigheid, Dutch Tourism Board ANWB and the agriculture and horticulture organization LTO Westerveld. The Board gives independent advices regarding the nomination files and is used for collecting reflections from the local residents. The group hosts 9 members, an independent president plus secretary. ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Bernard', 'last_name': 'Stikfort', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Beleidsregisseur Erfgoed, Cultuurhistorie en Monumenten bij Gemeente Westerveld'}]}, {'title': 'Grade 3 listed monuments of Westerveld Municipality', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'Inventory of non-listed historical buildings & conservation areas which could be placed on the local municipal (grade 3) heritage list; proposal of compensation measures for affected owners', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Bernard', 'last_name': 'Stikfort', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Beleidsregisseur Erfgoed, Cultuurhistorie en Monumenten bij Gemeente Westerveld'}]}, {'title': 'Book: Cultural-historical pearls of Westerveld (Editor)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'Historical Cultural policy is converted into a public translation in collaboration with local historical societies and co-authors which are field proffesionals. The Cultural-historical book will be edited in this project; the archeology- version by a 3rd party. Both books are due to be presentated by the end of 2013; the index will host the following 5 main topics:

- Nobility
- Heritage of War
- Colonies of Benevolence
- Astronomy / Radiotelescope incl the Würzburg Rieze
- Village greens and conservation areas

Subtopics will be:

- Historical infrastructure
- Monuments of War (commemoration)
- Artworks (in public space)
- Listed monuments
- Intangible & oral heritage
- Guilds and Boermarken (ancient farmersguild / Farmers governance)', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Bernard', 'last_name': 'Stikfort', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Beleidsregisseur Erfgoed, Cultuurhistorie en Monumenten bij Gemeente Westerveld'}]}, {'title': 'Preliminary Dutch World Heritage List', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'Working together with all involved local and provincial Dutch- and Belgian governments to get all 7 former colonies of Benevolence (Maatschappij van Weldadigheid) on the UNESCO World Heritage List by 2018 when the Maatschappij celebrates its 200 anniversary.
', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Bernard', 'last_name': 'Stikfort', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Beleidsregisseur Erfgoed, Cultuurhistorie en Monumenten bij Gemeente Westerveld'}]}]

Het statutair gevestigd in Ommelanderwijk, Veendam, positie benoemd door de notaris op verzoek van het oprichtingsbestuur.
